alert.note: Alert for Bristol; Eastern Kent; Newport; Southeast Providence; Washington (Rhode Island) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Coastal Flood Watch issued December 17 at 3:06AM EST until December 18 at 2:00PM EST by NWS Boston
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM MONDAY MORNING THROUGH MONDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...One to two feet of inundation above ground level possible in low-lying areas near shorelines and tidal waterways (5.4 to 8.2 feet Mean Lower Low Water). * WHERE...Southeast Providence RI, Eastern Kent RI, Bristol RI, Washington RI and Newport RI Counties. * WHEN...From Monday morning through Monday afternoon, especially around the noon Monday high tide. * IMPACTS...Minor coastal flooding is expected in the lowest lying areas Newport, Portsmouth and Middletown. A few immediate coastal roads briefly flood due to wave action. Minor coastal flooding occurs in the Common Fence Point area of Newport. A few parking lots adjacent to beaches are flooded in Newport. && Time of high total tides are approximate to the nearest hour. info.instruction: If travel is required, allow extra time as some roads may be closed. Do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth. Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property.
